item.title: iOS / Hotspot Study
item.description: Original Hotspot Network Subsystem Programming Guide 번역 About the Hotspot Network Subsystem The Hotspot Network Subsystem allows a Hotspot Helper application to participate in the process of classifying and authenticating to Wi-Fi hotspot networks.
